Subskills.name: Cannon Scatter
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of chain bounces.

Subskills.name: Shrapnel Count
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of shrapnel from cannonball explosion.

Subskills.name: Bomb Trail
Subskills.description: Cannonball no longer chains but is now piercing and unleashes bombs on every monster hit.

Subskills.name: Cannon Accuracy
Subskills.description: Increases the attack rating when using cannonball.

Subskills.name: Steel Balls
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by cannonball.

Subskills.name: Slowmode
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by cannonball shrapnel.

Subskills.name: Empowered Blasting Powder
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of cannonball shrapnel.

Subskills.name: Rolling Balls
Subskills.description: Fire rolling cannon balls traveling forward on the ground exploding with increased radius and inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Mayday
Subskills.description: Increases the size and explosion area of effect radius of cannonball.

Subskills.name: Slay the Weak
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Blasting Balls
Subskills.description: Cannonball no longer explodes on hit but instead knocks monsters back with increased damage according to the amount of shrapnel.

Subskills.name: Blast the Horizon
Subskills.description: Fire multiple cannonballs in an arc with decreased damage and bounces.

Subskills.name: Mega Shot
Subskills.description: Fire a mega cannon ball with increased damage unleashing additional cannonballs around the impact location.
